Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 7th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1984...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1984...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1984 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 5/15/1984 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Injured on 4/2/1987 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/2/1988, off Rick Sutcliffe (CAL)...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 8/2/1988...
Injured on 9/16/1988 with a Dislocated Shoulder, out for 6-7 weeks...
Drove in 8 runs against California on 8/16/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1989, hitting .455 with 3 HR, 8 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 4 RBI against Detroit on 9/6/1989...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/1/1990, hitting .462 with 1 HR, 8 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/12/1991, hitting .423 with 6 HR, 9 RBI...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
